data.text: Nan borim, nɨ nan akam baragh,
Egh nɨghnɨzir aghuim anɨdir akaba baragh.
Egh nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozir aghuim bagh azangsɨghtɨ aning nɨ bagh izam,
Egh nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim bativsɨ pamtemɨn ingar, mati gumazim silvan nguazimɨn aven itim a buri,
Egh nɨ bizir kabar amuva, egh nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn apengan ikia an atiatir arazim bar a gɨfoghɨva,
Guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God uabɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim e ganɨdi.
Egha a gumazamizir arazir aghuibar gɨn zuiba, nɨghnɨzir aghuiba me ganɨdi.
God gumazamizibar gari, me gumazamizir igharaziba deragha arazir magh gariba me gami, ezɨ a deravɨra men gara men akura.
Nan borim, nɨ nan akam bareghɨva, egh nɨghnɨzir aghuimɨn gɨn mangɨva, egh tuavir aghuir nɨ mangamim a gɨfogham.
Egh nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuir avɨriba iniva,
Nɨ deragh tuaviba tuisɨghamin arazim gɨfoghɨva egh tuavir aghuimɨn gɨn mangam.
Eghtɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim nɨn akurvaghtɨ,
Gumazir kaba tuavir aghuim ategha
Egha me arazir kurabar amuasa bar akonge.
Gumazir kaba ifarava,
Eghtɨ gumazir igharazimɨn amuim nɨ ko dakusɨ apezeperir akabar nɨ mɨkɨmam,
Kamagh garir amizim, fomɨra uan igiamra pamɨn ike, egha datɨrɨghɨn a gɨn amadagha anetaki.
Nɨ amizir kamɨn gɨn an dɨpenimɨn ghua,
Gumazir a bagha zuiba, me ua izir puvatɨ.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim ikɨva,
Eghtɨ gumazir aghuiba en nguazimɨn ikiam.
Eghtɨ gumazim uan azenimɨn ogheba asi moghɨn,
